channel.title: Out Of Interest #1
channel.description:
[center][b]Hi, this quiz is just simply out of interest, these are questions related to Moparscape and why you chose to become a member of the Moparscape community.[/b][/center]
1. Why did you join Moparscape?
2. What interests you most? Playing on other people's servers or creating your own
3. Do you own a server of your own? If so what is the ip and port?
4. Did you, honestly, read Mod Thaorak's ultimate guide to creating a server, before actually attempting one?
5. Did you, honestly, read the rules when you first registered? and read the new ones?
6. Is there a question stuck at the back of your mind that you have always wondered about Private Servers?
7. Have you ever broken any of the forum's rules?
8. Do you want any information about creating a server or perhaps editing?
9. Do you prefer Moparscape to Runescape? If so, tell us why.
10. Do you understand the Java language?
Simply Copy + Paste this and write your answer underneath the questions.
_____________________________________________________________________
Mods, please do not lock, if you feel this is in the wrong section, please move. Thank you. _____________________________________________________________________

item.title: Out Of Interest #1
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

  1. Why did you join Moparscape? I heard of a ‘RuneScape’ where you could get free PHats etc, after hours of searching I found MoparScape

  2. What interests you most? Playing on other people’s servers or creating your own Playing on other people’s and browsing the forums.

  3. Do you own a server of your own? If so what is the ip and port?

  4. Did you, honestly, read Mod Thaorak’s ultimate guide to creating a server, before actually attempting one? I’ve never made a server.

  5. Did you, honestly, read the rules when you first registered? and read the new ones? I read the rules when I registered briefly, never read the new ones.

  6. Is there a question stuck at the back of your mind that you have always wondered about Private Servers? Many questions.

  7. Have you ever broken any of the forum’s rules? Yes, the reason I am warned today is because I broke a rule.

  8. Do you want any information about creating a server or perhaps editing? Maybe some other day.

  9. Do you prefer Moparscape to Runescape? If so, tell us why. MoparScape. I don’t know the reason, mostly because certain rules on RuneScape aren’t rules on here, swearing etc. Fuck :). Plus the people here are more friendly, it’s a much more exciting enviroment to be in.

  10. Do you understand the Java language? Nope, not one part of it whatsoever.

Read full topic

item.title: Out Of Interest #1
item.dc:creator: @Eportal Eportal
item.description:
@Eportal wrote:

  1. Why did you join Moparscape? found it randomly then I decided it would be fun to make a server.

  2. What interests you most? Playing on other people’s servers or creating your own? Totally creating my own it’s so fun

  3. Do you own a server of your own? If so what is the ip and port? Yes, Im not officialy releasing yet, just got the forums and website, and of course the server and client, but i didnt release it yet. Oh yeah, it’s in my signiture lolz.

  4. Did you, honestly, read Mod Thaorak’s ultimate guide to creating a server, before actually attempting one? yes, didn’t help me a lot though, no-ip was so complicated with the port forward and all, so i just used hamachi

  5. Did you, honestly, read the rules when you first registered? and read the new ones?clears throught no, coughs but the new ones yes.

  6. Is there a question stuck at the back of your mind that you have always wondered about Private Servers? YES! How the hell do you make a webclient…?

  7. Have you ever broken any of the forum’s rules? When i was a noob, yes

  8. Do you want any information about creating a server or perhaps editing? No, and the info i know right now, i learned myself.

  9. Do you prefer Moparscape to Runescape? If so, tell us why. Moparscape, so much to do, convert npc’s, items, objects, ::noclip ect and runescape is boring like hell.

  10. Do you understand the Java language? I consider myself a noob in java, but making myself around a not so noobish rank but I am always learning more.

Read full topic

item.title: Out Of Interest #1
item.dc:creator: @zammyking111 zammyking111
item.description:
@zammyking111 wrote:

1. Why did you join Moparscape? Because of runescape private servers and runescape got gay

2. What interests you most? Playing on other people’s servers or creating your own Creating

3. Do you own a server of your own? If so what is the ip and port? Yes dont have the ip still creating

4. Did you, honestly, read Mod Thaorak’s ultimate guide to creating a server, before actually attempting one? Nope never read it waste of time

5. Did you, honestly, read the rules when you first registered? and read the new ones? Yes

6. Is there a question stuck at the back of your mind that you have always wondered about Private Servers? Nope

7. Have you ever broken any of the forum’s rules? umm on my old account I did I accidently spammed

8. Do you want any information about creating a server or perhaps editing? umm i got it by myself

9. Do you prefer Moparscape to Runescape? Private servers becuase there is no freedom of speech in gayscape

10. Do you understand the Java language? yes pretty well

Also nov9862 i reported you for spam

Read full topic

item.title: Out Of Interest #1
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

  1. Why did you join Moparscape? RuneScape was boring the hell outta me, i was a pmod and tried muting a Jagex mod permenantly, …moral is don’t try it -.-

  2. What interests you most? Playing on other people’s servers or creating your own : Creating my own, got one in development now, set up all the forums, got 65+ things added to it

  3. Do you own a server of your own? If so what is the ip and port? Aye, i aint releasing yet, i just have a forum.

  4. Did you, honestly, read Mod Thaorak’s ultimate guide to creating a server, before actually attempting one? Yup, i respect others wishes.

  5. Did you, honestly, read the rules when you first registered? and read the new ones? Yes.

  6. Is there a question stuck at the back of your mind that you have always wondered about Private Servers? Yes.

  7. Have you ever broken any of the forum’s rules? Yes, my own fault though.

  8. Do you want any information about creating a server or perhaps editing? A nice team helping me would be nice Currently got 2 others =/

  9. Do you prefer Moparscape to Runescape? If so, tell us why. MoparScape, i used to love RuneScape, became a pmod, enjoyed it for about a month, then started boring the hell outta me, decided to perm mute a j mod, and quit. With MoparScape, non of the Gold mods are so far up there own ass’s theyl ban you for anything -.-

  10. Do you understand the Java language? Could learn more

Read full topic
